definitions.title: n. m.
definitions.body: :Je 12:19 bird(s) of prey (from scream);—abs. ´[[ע]] Ge 15:11+, [[עָָיִט]] Job 28:7, c. art. (perh.) ´[[הַע]] Je 12:9 b (cf. Gie; ´[[הַע]] interrog. v:a); cstr. [[עֵיט]] Is 18:6, Ez Eze 39:4; —usu. coll. Ge 15:11 (JE), Is 18:6, Job 28:7, [[עֵיט הָרִים]] Is 18:6, [[עֵיט]] [[חִפּוֹר כָּל־כָּנׇף]] Ez Eze 39:4; fig. of foes of Judah Je 12:9 b; of single bird v:Je 12:9 a (fig. of Judah), Is 46:11 (fig. of invader, ‖[[אִישׁ עֲחָתִי]]).
